changes: Add manual bookmaker balance update button
The chrome extension no longer automatically updates bookmaker balances
Fix for Betfair horse racing runners
Add support for Tab Same Game Multi's.
Fix some selections being 'undefined' when an event is matched.
Fix bet form event display when editing bets using the Track Button.
Added support for Ladbrokes and UniBet.
Automatic balance updates for supported bookmakers when visiting their sites.
Improved event matching in the extension, including add/update/delete in the bet form.
New hover preview on 'Track with BetTrackr' button showing details including event details (if available)
Changelog now accessible from the account page.
Performance improvements, optimisations, and caching enhancements.
